Flu_Dual_Slider Class Reference

This class is essentially an Fl_Slider but with two handles. type() can be one of FL_HOR_SLIDER, FL_HOR_NICE_SLIDER, FL_VERT_SLIDER, FL_VERT_NICE_SLIDER. More...

#include <Flu_Dual_Slider.h>

bool low_grabbed () const
 
Returns:
true if the low value slider is currently grabbed by the mouse, false otherwise


bool high_grabbed () const
 
Returns:
true if the high value slider is currently grabbed by the mouse, false otherwise


Detailed Description

This class is essentially an Fl_Slider but with two handles. type() can be one of FL_HOR_SLIDER, FL_HOR_NICE_SLIDER, FL_VERT_SLIDER, FL_VERT_NICE_SLIDER.
